Summary: Red object shaped like a half moon and directly under it was red looking cloud that hovered just above the tree line.
divs: Sighting Details1. I was on my way home on the I240 interstate heading north at or around 3:00am. 2. Well as the trees along my way came to a clearing I saw a red hazy object. 3. I thought it was the moon at first glance but it was to low in the sky. 4. Red hazy half moon with a red haze of a cloud under it, it was slowly moving down below the tree line. 5. I slowed down a little and watched it for a min and then I went on home. 6. It went well below the tree line.
trends: There have been 62 other sightings in Memphis
There were no other sightings in Memphis on or around August 17th 2005
